The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

wikitext.*:
{{book | title=J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1979 | image = J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1979.jpg | illustrator=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] | editor=[[Christopher Tolkien]] | publisher=[[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] (UK) | date=[[1978]] | format=Wire-bound calendar with mailer (117⁄8 x 151⁄8 inches) | pages= | isbn=0045290059 | precededby=[[The Silmarillion Calendar 1978]] | followedby=None. Next calendar:
[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1984]] }} The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1979''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1978]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], with commentary by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. The cover photographer was [[Billett Potter]].{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=63620|articlename=The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1979|website=TB|=accessed 7 June 2011}} ==Illustrations== * January - "Three Dragons" * February - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Hall at Bag-End, Residence of B. Baggins Esquire (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|The Hall at Bag-End, Residence of B. Baggins Esquire]]" Coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]] * March - "Patterns (I)" * April - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Elvenking's Gate (I).jpg|The Elvenking's Gate (I)]]" * May - "Trees" * June - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Three Trolls are turned to Stone (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|The Three Trolls are Turned to Stone]]" Coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]] * July - "Patterns (II)" * August - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Bilbo comes to the Huts of the Raft-elves (I).jpg|Bilbo comes to the Huts of the Raft-elves (I)]]" * September - "Floral Designs" * October - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Smaug flies round the Mountain.jpg|Smaug Flies Around the Mountain]]" * November - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Flowering Tree with Friezes.jpg|Flowering Tree with Friezes]]" * December - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Polar Bear had fallen from top to bottom onto his nose.jpg|Polar Bear had fallen from top to bottom onto his nose]]" ===Note=== ==See also== * ''[[Pictures by J.R.R.
